name: ZeroPlay
description:
Overview: the game is a visceral experience, in which the player plays an amateur journalist hired by a mysterious company, whose objective is to record his discoveries of an abandoned and supposedly haunted place. The key point of the project is to place the player inside one of the countless videos that we find on the internet, in which random people film sinister things, like those in which the person is in a dark forest and films, for a second, a bizarre creature of bright Eyes. We are a family owned and operated business.
